articles.title: Jet2 flight U-turn RECAP: Plane flying from Newcastle to Turkey turns around after 'crew reported fault' - Chronicle Live
articles.description: The flight from Newcastle to Antalya turned back around and landed at Newcastle Airport
articles.content:
A Jet2 flight from Newcastle to Turkey has turned around after "declaring an emergency", it has been reported.
